descriptions.description: 1. When inputting estimated costs, the user may enter as many categories as they want and as many individual charges for each category.
2. Upon saving the inputs for a category, the green checkbox will appear and the category details will be hidden.

3. When inputting invoices, my tool looks up the vendor to which the invoice is due, calculates when the due date is(according to their payment terms), and sends out email alerts when the due date is getting close.
4. Here we see a report for a project.
